=API for test-is.tap=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.test-is.tap))
}}}
==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_print-tap-diagnostic_data) print-tap-diagnostic] [#(_print-tap-fail_msg) print-tap-fail] [#(_print-tap-pass_msg) print-tap-pass] [#(_print-tap-plan_n) print-tap-plan] [#(_with-tap-output_&_body) with-tap-output] 

----
===(_print-tap-diagnostic_ data)===
Prints a TAP diagnostic line.  data is a (possibly multi-line)
string.
----
===(_print-tap-fail_ msg)===
Prints a TAP 'not ok' line.  msg is a string, with no line breaks
----
===(_print-tap-pass_ msg)===
Prints a TAP 'ok' line.  msg is a string, with no line breaks
----
===(_print-tap-plan_ n)===
Prints a TAP plan line like '1..n'.  n is the number of tests
----
===(_with-tap-output_ & body)===
====Macro====
Execute body with modified test-is reporting functions that produce
TAP output
